amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 116-330 to ensure that corals are included as a natural element eligible for grants provided for by the Living Shoreline Grant Program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment includes corals as a natural element eligible for grants provided for by the Living Shoreline Grant Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mucarsel-Powell amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 285 - 134 (Roll no. 664).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mucarsel-Powell amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 285 - 134 (Roll no. 664).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Mucarsel-Powell.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
